name: @doinkythederp/progress-bar
description: A console progress bar for JS

scripts.compile: echo "Compiling..." && tsc ts/index.ts --outDir src/cjs/ -d -t es2020 -m commonjs --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node && echo "Done!"
scripts.compile-es: echo "Compiling..." && tsc ts/index.ts --outDir src/ -d -t es2020 -m es2020 --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node && echo "Done!"

author: doinkythederp
